item.title: The wealth of the top 1% reaches a record $52 trillion
item.description: All wealth groups saw gains over the past year, according to recent Fed data. But the growth has been fastest for those at the very top.

item.title: Top 10% see record wealth growth: Here's what to know
item.description: The top 1% of Americans has seen their wealth grow to record levels so far this year. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

item.title: The global wealthy are lining up for Trump's $1 million Gold Card after price cut

item.title: Trump gold card expected to sell out: Here's what to know
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the latest news.
